short_doc:
Add a custom extension for approval.
Must follow the extension guidelines.

url.name: url
url.description: The URL of the extension to load. Must be a valid Python file URL or a Git repository URL.

name.name: filename
name.description: Required if the URL is a Git repo URL. The filename of the extension to load. Defaults to main.py.

confirm:
**Before submitting, you have to read the [extension guidelines](<{rules_url}>)!**
Are you sure you want to submit this extension?
time: -# *The buttons will be enabled in 30 seconds. In the meantime, you should read the guidelines.*
done: The extension has been submitted for approval. Please wait for a staff member to review it.
cancelled: Okay. When the extension is ready, you can run the command again to submit it.
banned: You have been banned from custom extensions.
